DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study demonstrate Diagnostic Absorbent Panty liner ( AL-SENSE Amniotic Leak Test Kit ) , develop Common Sense Ltd. , distinguish wetness sense pregnant woman cause amniotic fluid leakage cause urinary incontinence .
DOC.criteria: age 18 45 year . minimum 16 week pregnancy . willing sign inform consent form . arrive obstetric department report feel vaginal wetness ( undetermined whether amniotic fluid leakage urinary incontinence ) . experienced intermittent vaginal bleeding 2nd 3rd trimester . sexual relation within last 12 hour . unable unwilling cooperate study procedure . use ALSENSE join study . diagnose Bacterial Vaginosis Trichomonas infection within last 3 day . use vaginal product douche formula , antibiotic treatment reduce lactobacillus population . use drug reduce estrogen level tamoxifen drug dry mucous membrane , antihistamine diet alkalize food Alkaliveâ„¢ Green , may cause elevation vaginal pH level .
